short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trimming, resizing, and converting designs into patterns, as well as transferring designs to the back of products on Merch on Demand

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your design workflow with the Snap Tool for Merch on Demand! This powerful Chrome extension streamlines the process of preparing designs for MOD products. With just one click, you can trim, resize, scale, convert your designs into patterns, and transfer them to the back of apparel products for Merch on Demand. Save time and ensure perfect results with every upload.

Key Features:
• Trim: Automatically remove excess transparent areas for better alignment.
• Resize & Scale: Adjust your designs to the optimal size and scale effortlessly.
• Convert to Pattern: Turn your artwork into seamless patterns for a polished look.
• Transfer to Back: Instantly move your design from front to back with a single click.
• Toggle all design guides on or off with a single click.
• Copy both bullet features into the description with one click.
• Upload 2 different designs to the tumbler product.
• Upload your design in any size and instantly convert it to 4500x5400px.
• Find and replace keywords easily. Add up to 4 find-and-replace fields..


Boost your productivity and elevate your MOD product offerings with the Snap Tool for Merch on Demand.
